title: Designing brand identity
description: As founding designer at Foyer, this was my first task. Foyer was a dev tech tool so I wanted to make the logo as simple as >â€¿<

title: Designing landing page
description: This was the design task which got me selected in Foyer in the first place. So I made the full version of it with the new branding and guidelines.

title: Designing Slack bot
description: Foyer was making tools for eng. managers. One part of it was sending updates of tickets via Slack. So rather than designing it on Figma, I made it on Slack blocks code editor.

title: Pivoting a new product
description: As ChatGPT announced its first release, we rode the wave of AI and started pivoting our product. Merlin started by designing a simple chrome extension that generate AI result on SERP.

title: Introducing cmd+m
description: We got incredible response from our users. So we decided to make a chrome extension that can be used as a commandbar on any webpage. We were the first one ever in the market to ideate this.
